question: Which financial institution has signed USD 270 million loan to strengthen Urban local bodies in Madhya Pradesh?
explanation:
The Asian Development Bank (ADB) and the Government of India on Monday signed a USD 270 million loan to strengthen the urban local bodies in Madhya Pradesh.
The loan amount will be deployed to develop water supply and integrated storm-water and sewage management infrastructure. The Madhya Pradesh Urban Services Improvement Project was earlier approved in 2017 with a USD 275 million loan.
